sections.reasoning: Opens with a gentle, spacious look that can settle into the groove without over-selling energy.
First lift: lateral fan sweeps read clearly on 4 heads and the pulse supports the chorus rhythm.
Sustained high-energy chorus block calls for a driving loop that maintains momentum through repeated phrases.
A short chorus segment benefits from a calmer, stepping look to reset the eye after the peak block.
Rebuilds intensity with directional left-right cascading pulses that feel like forward motion through the long chorus.
Drops back to a breathing pendulum to create contrast and make the next chorus hit bigger.
Short chorus: a strong, stable circle/fan statement that reads immediately without needing a long build.
Final chorus peak: bouncy fan pulses maximize perceived energy and match repeated hook phrasing.
End-of-run intensifier: extreme clamp + strobe as the final punctuation before the outro.
Clean, controlled exit that visually signals the track ending without lingering high-intensity motion.

overall_strategy: 3/4 at ~159 BPM benefits from strong phrasing and frequent, readable motion changes. Verses use breathable pendulum/wave looks with lower intensity and occasional step-crossfades to keep interest. Choruses escalate by rotating through fan/sweep/circle templates, reserving strobe/clamp accents for peak moments and section transitions. Final chorus is the densest (more pulse + strobe hits), then a clean fade-out outro.
